description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in GS Plugins Logo Slider – Logo Showcase, Logo Carousel, Logo Gallery and Client Logo Presentation.This issue affects Logo Slider – Logo Showcase, Logo Carousel, Logo Gallery and Client Logo Presentation: from n/a through 3.5.1.

product.name: Logo Slider – Logo Showcase, Logo Carousel, Logo Gallery and Client Logo Presentation
